column4: oh right, I've never used VNC and just going by the descriptions apt-cache gives me :P
VNC server for GNOME sounds quite promosing lol

well he asked for a VNC Client, I didn't know of any so I did "sudo apt-cache search vnc" to find vnc programs, and saw Vino with a description of "vnc server for Gnome" so I thought that sounded good
